# Installation
Copier les lignes suivantes dans la console pour installer la librairie *inesss*.
```{r, eval=FALSE}
if (!"remotes" %in% installed.packages()[,1]) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("INESSS-QC/inesss")
```

# Notes de création
```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE}
packages <- c(
  "askpass",
  "data.table", "DBI",
  "fs",
  "lubridate",
  "miniUI",
  "odbc",
  "readxl", "rstudioapi",
  "shiny", "shinydashboard", "shinyFiles", "stringr",
  "testthat",
  "writexl"
)
txt <- c(base::R.version$version.string)
for (pk in packages) {
  if (is_html_output()) {
    txt <- paste0(txt, "<br>\n`",pk,"` version ", as.character(packageVersion(pk)))
  } else {
    txt <- paste0(txt, "\\newline\n`",pk,"` version ", as.character(packageVersion(pk)))
  }
}
cat(txt)
```
